snippet.title: Balls Royale - Battle Royale inspired by classic arcade game
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1233780/Balls_Royale/
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/balls-royale-mobile/id6447994397
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MeatyOreGames.BallsRoyale

Bases, paddles and balls... you know what it is!
Now in Battle Royale version!

Balls Royale is 50 players Battle Royale inspired by classic arcade game.
Massive cross-platform multiplayer free-for-all rounds.

CROSS-PLATFORM MULTIPLAYER!
Game is available for PCs on Steam and for free for Android on Google Play and iOS on App Store. Players from different platforms can compete with each other in online games and world ranking!

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/ZhD5fsh

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/BallsRoyale/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Balls%20Royale
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MeatyOreGames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/meatyoregames/
